nodes.text: Recruitment was a section of the Commission for the Preservation of the New Order's Sub-Adult Group that was responsible for recruiting new members into the organization's ranks. By the time of the Galactic Civil War, their activities were at record levels, with incentives offered to parents and families to ensure their progeny joined SAGroup. Recruitment aimed to increase SAGroup's ranks to over ten trillion members over the following five years. The Imperial Security Bureau were gently supporting Recruitment as the division sought to move out from under SAGroup headquarters' control.
